title: Quite a few t201s, t205s, t206s, t209s and t210s for sale...
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Quite a few t201s, t205s, t206s, t209s and t210s for sale...
posts.post_content:
Quite a few cards available.  Would trade generously for t204 beaters too.  Scans are available upon request.  Thanks in advance,

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]


t201 Meyers/Doyle GD/VG - mild corner wrinkle -- $35
t205 Leach PSA AUT [Broadleaf back] - torn corner, otherwise very nice - $75
t205 Fromme VG - no wrinkling -- $30
t205 Lord VG - no wrinkling -- $30
t205 Simmons VG - no wrinkling -- $30
t205 Richie VG - no wrinkling -- $30
t205 Gaspar VG - one corner wrinkle -- $30
t206 Chance (port - YELLOW w/ overprint) PR/FR - pinhole, wrinkling - $40
t207 Fromme VG+ - mostly sharp corners, no wrinkling -- $35 
t207 Schaefer VG - offcentered, sharp corners, no wrinkling -- $30 
t209-2 Ebinger (Wilmington) VG - mild corner wear, no wrinkling -- SOLD
t209-2 Beusewein (Charlotte) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- SOLD
t209-2 Boyle (Fayetteville) PR - wear/nicks on front -- SOLD
t209-2 Kelley (Wilmington) FR/GD - mild wrinkling -- SOLD
t210-2 Levy VG - toughest card in set!  No creases -- $250
t210 Series 7 Ham SGC 20 - The ONLY example that has been slabbed by PSA, SGC, etc.. -- $135
t210 Series 7 Hyames SGC 30 (no creases) -- $285
t210 Series 7 Irving SGC AUT - The ONLY example that has been slabbed by PSA, SGC, etc.. -- $110
t210 Series 7 Gunderson SGC 10 - The ONLY example to be graded by SGC -- $85
Sending e-mail about T209 Boyle and Kelley

Hey Brian,
I'll take the T209 Ebeinger and Bausewein.
